duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nail and hand services including natural manicures, pedicures, hand and foot massage, and treatments specific to Miraval and relevant product lines.
Hold current Texas State Manicurist or Cosmetology license issued by the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation (TDLR).
Maintain excellent organizational, time management, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Work with open availability including evenings, weekends, and holidays, maintaining a positive attitude and focusing on guest satisfaction in a luxury spa environment.

education_certification.credential: Completed 600 hours of instruction in manicuring through a commission-approved training program.
Hold current Texas State Manicurist or Cosmetology license issued by the Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation (TDLR).
